config.title: Config File Names
config.description:
ESLint config file names to look for.

Adding config file names here will take precedence over the default order.

Default order is:

"eslint.config.js"
"eslint.config.mjs"
"eslint.config.cjs"
"eslint.config.ts"
"eslint.config.mts"
"eslint.config.cts"
